string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Pempek is a famous Palembang dish made from fish and tapioca starch. It is typically served with a sweet and tangy sauce called "kuah cuko" and garnished with cucumber and shrimp.
Laksa Palembang is a flavorful noodle soup made with a coconut milk-based broth, shredded chicken, prawns, and a variety of herbs and spices. It has a rich and spicy flavor.
Mie Celor is a Palembang noodle dish served in a creamy coconut milk and shrimp-based broth. It is garnished with prawns, boiled eggs, and fried shallots.
Pindang Musi is a sour and spicy fish soup made with tamarind, ginger, and lemongrass. It often includes fish, shrimp, and vegetables.
Tekwan is a Palembang soup made with fish and shrimp. It has a clear and savory broth, often served with mushrooms, tofu, and vermicelli noodles.
Sate Padang consists of skewered and grilled beef served with a rich and spicy peanut sauce. It\'s a popular street food dish in Palembang.
Pindang Serani is a sweet and sour soup made from tamarind and palm sugar. It is usually cooked with fish, shrimp, and vegetables.
Lakso is a Palembang dish that features thick rice noodles in a coconut milk-based soup, often served with shredded chicken, prawns, and herbs.
Sambal Tempoyak is a spicy condiment made from fermented durian fruit mixed with chilies and other ingredients. It has a unique and bold flavor.
Ketan Durian is a dessert made from sticky rice topped with durian fruit and sweet coconut milk. It\'s a favorite among durian enthusiasts.
Pempek Kapal Selam is a type of Pempek where a whole boiled egg is encased within the fish and tapioca dough before frying. It\'s often served with a generous drizzle of kuah cuko sauce.
Mie Gomak Palembang is a spicy noodle dish known for its bold flavors. It consists of flat rice noodles served in a creamy coconut milk and ground fish broth, with a fiery chili paste.
Gulai Ikan Patin is a Palembang-style fish curry made with freshwater patin fish cooked in a rich and aromatic coconut milk sauce, flavored with turmeric and lemongrass.
Kapurung is a traditional Palembang salad made with shredded young papaya, grated coconut, and a mixture of aromatic herbs and spices, creating a refreshing and spicy side dish.
Tekwan Bangka is a variation of the Palembang Tekwan soup found on the neighboring island of Bangka. It typically features fish and prawn-based broth with ingredients like mushrooms and tofu.
Mie Celor Kuah Kuning is a Palembang dish similar to Mie Celor but with a distinct yellow-hued broth, achieved through the use of turmeric, and garnished with prawns and boiled eggs.

string-array.name: kesukan_desc
string-array.item: Makanan ini, merupakan salah satu makanan yang Hapis suka. Tidak terlepas dari itu ada banyak lagi makanan yang disukai oleh Hapis. Silahkan back untuk melihat semua makanan yang disukai Hapis
